mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.AD_EXPO_NUM FROM TBL_AD a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ad_IDX, COUNT(*) AS AD_EXPO_NUM FROM TBL_EXPOSURE GROUP BY AD_IDX) b on(a.ad_IDX = b.ad_IDX) WHERE USER_IDX = #{user_idx}
SELECT * FROM TBL_AD WHERE AD_APPROVAL = 'Y' ORDER BY ad_play_number DESC
SELECT a.*, p.PAY_DATE FROM TBL_AD a LEFT JOIN TBL_PAY p ON a.AD_IDX = p.AD_IDX WHERE a.USER_IDX=#{user_idx} AND a.AD_APPROVAL = 'Y'
